gnu.x11
Class RGB

java.lang.Object
  gnu.x11.RGB

public class RGB
extends java.lang.Object

X RGB. Note, following the convention of X specification, these RGB values are 16-bit, ranging from 0 to 65535, instead of 8-bit (0 to 255) in some other areas.
